content.detailedDescription: Ok here is what happens nearly every night these lights look like a star but they are too bright to be stars they are low to the horizon .This first light comes around 8:05 every evening then leaves around 8:45 or so stars dont move .But not only this there was another 1 last nite on oct 4th at around 9:30 or so.This was awesome in brightness it has many colors to it .But the most distinctive colors were red ,blue and white .With a telescope or binoculars you can see rotation to it.We watched this object for 45 mins or so then it just slowly flys off to the north .These are not ballons ,flares ,planes ,helicopters, venus ,chinese lanterns,these objects move slowly .I have seen these objects multiply into 2objects.We have seen them blink out ,i mean totally disappear to nothing then reappear then slowly diasppear,always moving slowly.Nothing like you hear about speeds not recordable i have pics i will send you upon your request and will have videos also if you are interested.This is so strange .I have many witnesses.I want to be disproved tell me these are planes ,helicopters ,flares ,chinese lanterns ,or blimps .Iam tired of hearing these remarks .What we see are unidefied flying objects,and we want to know what the hell these things are.Thank you ronald krages
content.summary: Looks similar to a star but these move slowly  nearly every night

content.detailedDescription:
I probably have the most sighting reports in illinois and somehow have become brainwashed i am the reincarnation of an extra terrestrail.

something is happening in saint charles, illinois and i think that they are docked near my house everynight because of me. i am so certain because they often make theyre presence known by sending shooting stars followed by voices numerous times at the exact moment i might look up at the skies.

if you should visit st charles you will see with binaculars continuous unmarked low flying probably government planes circling the area 24-7 non stop for over a year now in st charles.

you will also see funny lights were as you should use a telescope pondering whether theyre satellites will appear as nothing but a bright white light unidentifyable. if you check the astronomy books there is no identifying as if the stars have misplaced itself 10 times the north stars usual brightness in the southern hemisphere.

ive grown so used to them here and the apparitions and voices of mary and jesus that i dont even look at the skies anymore because i know they are always here.

it takes a toll on me as if im waiting for revelation "i will come like a theif in the night" to happen and these things have been happening my entire life. 

back in wisconsin i remember my neighbor would always be walking his dogs at 4 am and looking up at the skies and i remember slightly sightings in my grandmas in greendale, wi back when i was little. 

my west highland terrior now has dissapeared and reapeared the other night and my parents said they never got out of bed or opened there door but the dog jump a flight of stairs in sight of my own eyes and my other dog seemed mystified by his reappearing act. the next morning i pet the terrior making him think he is speciel and magical he seemed to remember what had happenened the night before and my other dog looked at me puzzled. 

i think that god was testing his power and showing me what is going to happen to people by teletransferring my little dog , i thought i lost my mind afterwards and after investigating i am convinced jesus or the ufos or something is pehaps the 2012 mayan theory is accurate? my only debate is if ra sungod was the main god in egypt then ra was god the father of jesus therefore god was nicknamed the "master of deception" meaning the mayan 2012 theory is probably false. also becausee the bible warned about false prophets and fortune telling and jesus was called "a theif in the night".

my apparitions are in my head , mary and jesus pay more attention to me with telepathy  like i can see and hear them think about me every 30 minutes im beggening to believe im family or perhaps the reincarnation of an extra terrestrail meaning rebirth includes memory erasion because im uncertain.

the proof i have is these unmarked planes sometimes at times every day 5 minutes apart from one another flying directly over our house very lowly. ive used binaculors and they dont bear ups logos or even passenger lights but are constantly circling st charles, il. usually there is 5 or more unmarked planes circling st charles all day everyday. it is becoming obvious the governments research department is protecting the area from unidentified objects that are as what you can see constantly in st charles , probably because of me.

i am growing fatigued or making no plans for the future because this in constant,  such as going back to college and am gambling my life and health on skeptical issues of the unknown. they must have theyre own problems if they are letting us suffer and die on a dirty planet. everyday must not be christmas or why is the beloved jesus letting the best texas christians lives be destroyed by hurricanes? why are they obsessing on church and god and the bible in a world of chaos and anarchy? i am enraged at jesus for letting the people and the world come to this! is he tired after 2033 years or just lazy or frustrated? i dont pray or go to church but i sure get the ufos above the house on a 24-7 percentage. 

go ahead if youre wealthy st charles has a small airport nearby. rent a room at the marriot hotel near our house for a week and watch the constant unmarked planes circling as if they are obsessing on something here seeming not to be getting any answears on the lights.

if you should dare come stay at the marriot or super 8 near our hosue and watch the skies , if you find any answears you would bless my disturbed mind and email me at reharkthte@yahoo.Com

jolly roger
content.summary: I am growing fatigued

content.detailedDescription:
i decided to take a break during work. i stepped outside at around 2245 hrs(10:45 pm) the sky was clear, the stars where out. i was setting down looking up, enjoying the fresh air. i sat facing due east. i was out for about 8 minutes. then i saw an orange light begin to enter the high north west sky above me. at that point i thought "cool,a meteor." no sooner did this thought enter my mind, then its intensity grew and i could see it had a solid but plasma appearing form. it had a distinct fusalage and two forward swept wing like appendages. these where located well aft. this form remained constant as it travled to the south east across the sky almost directly over me. its relative size was about a half to three quarters of an inch at arms length, almost directly over me.  this decresed as it neared the se horizon. though its attitude remained true to its vector. the relative velocity was great, equivalent to a meteor or a shooting star. it retained the orange color and hue of the discharge from a standard neon glow light as it travled. it finaly disappeared out of veiw about 20 degrees above the south east horizon. it did not make a sound. i felt as though a profound truth was unveiled before me. regret was also felt in the fact no one else saw the same. but then again, it was huge, maybe some else did? 
  there where two people out side with me. they where about 30 feet away in a small doorless out building. they did not see a thing. i managed to keep my composure. i just shook my head and proceeded to head back to the main building.    
  thats what i saw. every word is true. i will stand in any court of law and state the same.

thank you,
jr
content.summary: A late evening, fast moving, high altitude, approx. nw to se orange glowing "ship".

content.detailedDescription:
I was standing out on my deck of my residence looking out at the night sky, around 9:36 p.M.(as i have done the past 2 nights because i saw this the night previously)  observing the stars, one in particular towards the west/northwestern area that was twinkling red,white,blue,green colors and stationary. my first thought was that it was a star just giving off those colors, this i saw with the naked eye, so i first used my eye glasses to focus on it and at one point i noticed an aircraft(with only the standard white,red strobes) going in proximity of it and it looked as if the (star or ufo)thing moved upwards,downwards then to the right and stationary again(i'm estimating this was probably 20-30 mi. away and i used the home next to me as a vantage point so i could tell if it was moving)i felt a little excited and my first instinct was to call a neighbor to witness this with me,but i retained composure. i went into my home to first get some binoculars, seeing it through thoses gave me a bit clearer sight of the various colored lights, i went back in my home again to get my telescope to try to enhance it more. viewing it through the telescope did enhance the varying colors,but was unable to make out a shape as it was moving away slowly, until after about 20 minutes it was no longer visible. after the initial excitement left me i felt rather sad because i wanted a closer look and unfortunately no pictures or video were taken.
 i do believe in etraterrestrials and feel that the time is very near to a revelation of their existence into our reality. this was my first sighting event and i know there will be others and i will be watching for it in the nights to come.
content.summary: Observed what i thought to be a star twinkling, white,red,blue,green colors. i've seen this twice in the last 3 days

content.detailedDescription:
There isn't a lot of description i can give, other than i saw three light-emitting objects hovering over the ocean, maybe a mile or two from where i was, off of fort lauderdale's beach on september 15, 2008, and that i took several pictures of which i hereby attach three (3).

the first picture, sequentially numbered dsc00066 by my camera, shows one bright round bulb-light object, which could erroneously be taken for venus, and two fuzzy orange objects at the top-left and bottom-left of the picture.

the next image, numbered dsc00067, doesn't show the top-left orange object anymore, shows the one at the bottom-left considerably up and above from its position in the previous picture, and the bright round bulb-light object has not moved.

at the last photograph, # dsc00070, the orange-colored objects had disappeared from sight, and the bright round bulb-light object had moved up and to the left of its previous position, now displaying a strange earring-like shape, emitting bright yellow light from its top and bright white light from its bottom.  this item, when magnified, suggests a horizontal dish-like shape with small window-like lights on both of its sides.

the untouched files, as transferred directly from my camera to my pc are available for analysis.  i would greatly appreciate expert or sound comments into what it is that i saw that evening.

i'm no expert, just a curious individual.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering
content.summary: Seen and pictured 3 ufos from fort lauderdale's beach on sep-15-2008

content.detailedDescription: It was friday morning and at the time i was knitting and talking on the phone with my grandson. my husband called me to the kitchen for some reason i don't know. my front kitchen window oversees west. i quickly turned my head to the upper right side of my window and i saw what i now know it to be an object shaped like a cigar zig zagging from left to right. at first i thought it was a kite because i didn't have my glasses on. but i continued watching the object.Because it started becoming bigger as it moved closer to the center of the window. i saw it was a cigar shaped grey blacksih color as it zoomed by my house. i ran to my backyard and looked at the sky, it was kind of cloudy but i could clearly see the object next to some cloud. i stood there with amazement and shouted for my husband to come, he couldn't make it b/c he was upstairs and couldn't hear me. after 2 minutes of the observation i saw the onbject punch a hole in the cloud and went upward into the atmosphere. i walked to my kitchen and shouted for my husband to come downstairs. i told him everything but he was skeptical and continued to tell me it was something like a bird b/c i didnt have my glasses. i put my glasses and showed my husband the hole in the cloud, he was skeptical and kept telling me it was probably a helicopter or plane. i went back to the phone and told my grandson everything. so far 20 minutes had expired since the first sighting on my kitchen window. i hung up my phone went to the sofa in the living room and watched the price is right for about 10 minutes. i got up and grabbed a cup of water when i saw a shadow coming up my driveway. i went to the garage with my camera. i saw the object go through my side backyard fence, i ran through my kitchen and into the backyard, i saw what appeared to be a man in black ran back again through the side fence and into my driveway, and quickly followed and took this photo as he was looking back at me. it was so scary that i ran back and told my husband, he called his friend and they were with us for about 2 hours. we didn't call the police department because he didn't think it was neccessary eventhough i kept telling him it was trespassing. next thing i knew i was on the computer learning more about mufon. around 40 minutes had expired. i don't know why a man in black would suddenly appear on my house right after this ufo sightings? quite mysterious looking man. i reported this saturday.
content.summary: Talking on phone, then saw object, then saw man in black stalking my house. ran outside with camera.

content.detailedDescription:
Hello, my name is vincent sheppard. i was recently on a retreat with the organization i work for up in mohonk mountain hotel. mohonk mountain is located in new paltz, new york in the catskill mountains. while i was there i took several pictures with my cell phone camera of the beautiful country and the surrounding mountains along the hudson river. when i got home and started to view the pics i had taken. i noticed that one of the pics appears to have something strange captured in it. i figured i would send it to mufon and see what you guys think. this picture has not been altered in anyway. i took this picture, uploaded it from my cell phone to my email account, and when i got home downloaded it and several others. the picture that i'm sending you appears to have three red objects and a plane or jet chasing it. i know this sounds crazy, but please see for yourself. i would be happy to discuss this further if you have any questions.
thank you,
content.summary: I did not know i was capturing the objects in the photo. i was taking a picture of the mountains and the view.

content.detailedDescription: daughter & i coming home from quick trip for milk.I see something to my left,in the sky ,& say to her 'what is that up there to your left'?She looks out her window & at first doesn't know , thinks it might be a plane.No sooner than she replied , it slowly drifted right in front of the car approx. 100-125 ft. in the air.It was definately a triangle shape w/rounded corners as the ones seen earlier in the year.But it didn't have the circular lights ,lit up anyway, it just had a solid blue on the left tip, red on the right & strobing bright white light in front.It made no noise that we could tell, & did not affect the car operations.So i chased after it , since it was now going down the road we needed to turn on(shiloh rd. corydon)so i sped up to it,& as i get caught up w/it it veers off the road to the right , like it's circling round to go back the way it came from...Only as it veered it tilted completely on it's side & remained that way as it flew straight(no longer turning)it just stayed on it's side!Blue light at top & red light now exactly under blue one!!Totally cool...My daughter was so happy to finally see one w/all of the activity we've had around here, this was her first close up sighting.    they like corydon for some reason...Maybe because we kindof like seeing them.;) (it was as big as a commercial airplane)
content.summary: Triangle ufo flew over car

content.detailedDescription: Noticed a large, stationary red object almost directly overhead, high altitude, and and about 30 seconds later, noticed a smaller, flickering red object, also stationary, to the west of large object. smaller object began to slowly move to the east/northeast, slowly at first, but seemed to constantly increase its velocity. larger object then began to move east/northeast, slowly. lost sight of smaller(by now fast moving) object, and focused on larger object. larger object, still slowly moving east/ northeast appeared to distinguish illumination, never reappeared to our vantage point. also noticed unusually high air traffic during and after, obvious commercial/ military aircraft.
content.summary: One stationary solid red object, second flickering red object stationary then traveling northeast, increasing velocuty, both disappear

content.detailedDescription: While driving on route 30 toward breezewood i spoted these in the air stopped on the road and snapped these pictures. latter i went and had the pictures blown up at wal-mart and found servial more "objects". i have the pictures and am willing to scan them and e-mail or speak to someone about them. i cannot at this time cause i am on a friends computer with out a scanner.
content.summary: Spoted severial ufo's over the town of breezewood, pennsylvaina, snapped picture.

content.detailedDescription:
My husband and i were coming back from morinville. it was apporx. 7:45pm. the sky was dark but not too dark as you can still see the blue in the sky. while driving down the highway to get back to fort saskatchewan we notice this very very bright amber colored light in the sky, (almost looks like say three street lights shining down on you). it looked much larger than an airplane for how high it was. it was high but not too high in the sky. it was in the same sky as jupiter.
i asked my husband what it was, seeing as how it seemed very very bright and large for a plane. it didn't seem to be moving either. as we are watching it while driving, it instantly vanishes. the lights seem to dim out and than that was it they were gone. the lights are gone and the object is no where to be found. 
about forty seconds later while we were still searching for this object that is no where to be found we than notice this flashing red light that is not travelling across the sky but straight up out of our atmosphere. it just kept going up until we could not locate it anymore. my husband said it seemed to look like the red light was rotating.
i have never ever seen anything like this before. we know it could not have been a plan or even a helicopter seeing as how when the very bright light went out, we still could not see anything in the sky. if it was a helicopter or an airplane, wouldn't we have still seen some form of light or even the shape of the plane or helicopter?? i'm hoping that someone has seen this same thing that we did. i would love to hear that i am not crazy:) this is not our first sighting, we have seen two other sightings in previous years, but nothing this prominent. i am so sad that i did not have the chance to tape this occurence.
if anyone else saw this please e-mail me!
content.summary: Very bright amber colored lights in sky and than disappears

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home from work that night and had maybe been driving for 30 seconds to one minute when i noticed lots of light movement in the sky to the south east of me. see the skys over victorvalley at lower altitudes are primarily quiet at night so when i looked i figured it was probably a chp chopper doing their nightly flying but then i saw the chopper to the north with its spotlight shining down at the ground. at seeing this i looked again because of my curiousity and noticed it had moved almost all the way across the horizon in maybe 30-45 seconds to the south-west of me the weird thing was once it was in that general location it seemed to stop completely. as i looked more at the object it was shining a bright orangeish-blue color with no distinct flashing lights, a few seconds later it was joined by another object identical to the first one and about 30 seconds later the first object shot to the north and was gone instantly. i was pretty shocked by that. i stopped at a red light and when i looked back at the area of sky the second light had disappeared as well. i'm not suprised by these type of things happening i have lived in the high desert/victorvalley area all my life and have probably had upwards of 30 unexplainable sightings.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Cigar shaped object flying at high speeds disappears

content.detailedDescription:
I was travelling on a train heading towards london waterloo station on the morning of 3rd july.  i had a window seat and the sky was fairly dull. whilst traveling between 2 stations (earlsfield and clapham junction) i noticed what i thought, at first anyway, was a large aeroplane. for a few seconds i didn't take too much notice, but then i realised this 'plane' didn't look right.  it was much longer than a normal passenger aeroplane that i had ever seen before.  i couldnt see any wings but thought it might just be the angle of the plane turning.  however then another normal plane came into view not far off and it became apparent at how white this object was, not as in glowing, but as if it was a sparkling colour of white, many shades cleaner than the other plane passing by.

straining more to see i could still see no wings, and realised that there was no tail to the plane either - the only marking seemed to be a single black spot in the middle, ie. just a thin missle shape with a black blob!

the train move direction and i could no longer see the plane.  i've thought hard about it during the last few weeks to think of logically what could it be or whether my eyes deceived me, but i have come to the conclusion that whatever i saw was 'odd' and i've certainly have never seen something like this before.

i've no idea if it was a ufo or perhaps a different type of flying vehicle!  but i want to add this - the location where i saw it is only a few minutes away from the mi6 building in vauxhall - i've heard stories from friends and people in the nearby areas of weird things in the skies round there, particularly at night. is this just a coincidence?
content.summary: A long missile shape, bright  white, no wings, tail, with black mark

content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting at my desk, when i heard a low noise. i look up puzzled and i saw what seemed to be a ufo. the sighting was near london city airport so it may have been a plane, but i doubt it. at first i thought it was a plane but then, i've never heard a plane make that noise. it was a humming noise, not like plane engines.

when i looked up i was puzzled. it looked very close, lower than most planes. it was a disc dotted with lights. coloured round the edges with two blue lights at the rear. it flew steadily, going over my house, which is when i lost track of it.

that wasn't the end. for the next 20 minutes we saw a massive increase in plane activity, at two points seeing a plane with an exceptionally bright light at the front (goverment search ships, or alien scouts?).

this sighting was somewhat unlikely. i do live near an airport, but if there are additional sightings, we may have "visitors".
content.summary: Low noise, lots of lights. planes.

content.detailedDescription:
March, 1981, while stationed at fliegerhorst kaserne (us army post), near hanau, germany, my husband, children and i lived in the small town of langenselbold.  it was a crisp, cold evening (no clouds). the time was approximately 9:00 p.M. and my son (age 8) and i were on the patio, viewing the full moon through a small telescope.  my son was viewing the moon, when he asked me, "what is that thing going across the moon?"  i took a look and there was a large, very obvious shadow (elongated, cigar shaped), trailing slowly across the moon from left to right, in a smooth, constant motion. it had to have been a very large ufo, to cast that big of a shadow.

as soon as the shadow reached the right side edge of the moon, it disappeared and a very bright object appeared to the right of the moon.  i could not see the object when it was casting the shadow, until it moved out from the face of the moon. the unidentified object then passed around and behind the moon, momentarily out of sight.  suddenly, it again appeared on the right side and moved back across the moon, again leaving a shadow that moved right to left.  then, as it came to the left side edge of the moon, the shadow disappeared and the bright object again became visible and darted out into space at a tremendous rate of speed, disappearing from view in 1 second.  total time of observing object was approximately 2 minutes.  distance was approximately 238,855 miles from earth.

at the time of the sighting, i had a feeling of excitement and awe. when my son and i rushed in to tell my husband, his exact words were, "hmm."  he believed me but he wasn't excited at all.  i told a couple of friends and their reaction was about the same.

i know this was not a satellite orbiting earth and i don't believe voyagers 1 & 2 were anywhere near that big, or that our probe (voyager 2) could fly to one side of the moon, then make a very sharp u-turn, fly back around the way it came and then accelerate to near light speed.  the ufo was huge, fast and had to have been controlled by some intelligence, probably not our own.

early this year, i took a photo of a ufo and have reported it to mufon.  as recently as sept. 22, 2008, my husband saw what he believes to be a ufo.  i will put that in a later report.
content.summary: Cigar shaped ufo moving across moon.

content.detailedDescription: I was returning home from athens, ga. traveling south on hwy 441. i was just comming into dublin, ga about 10:15 or 10:30, and had just past the elementary school in dublin, ga. it had been raining, but there was "open sky" no trees or buildings to block my veiw. i was slowing down as i was in a low speed zone, and looked to the right side of the windshield and happen to notice something moving through the air "very fast" and unusally low. at first i thought a plane was about to crash. i slowed down some more as it traveled across the air to the left of my car. i rolled my window down to see more clearly, and noticed there was "no noise"..No sound at all.. i saw only a row of green lights, i could see no shape other than the row of lights.  maybe six to eight of them, and from my veiw from the ground, they were about the size of a "mayonaise jar lid". they flashed "really fast."  i came almost to a complete stop as i watched it, then all of a sudden the lights just disappeared  and it was gone. i watched and nothing reappeared. this took place in just about 6 to 8 "seconds"  !!   i called my husband to tell him what i had seen, i was still about 20 miles from our home in rockledge, to see if maybe he could see anything from there.  he didn't, but talked to a man a couple of days later that had seen the same thing, at about the same time, and he lives on hwy. 199.  we do not know his name.
content.summary: Row of green lights/very low and fast/no noise

content.detailedDescription:
I was camping at an olema recreation/park camp area just talking with a buddy, and my other friend spotted the flying object first and brought it to my attention.
we watched it sail past us, hard to estimate altitude and size because it was at night.
for some reason, i did not get excited, it seemed to cruise by, not in a hurry, or evasive or anything. i had a feeling that it was one of 'ours'.
it seemed to have a constant-intensity white light at each of the three corners and a white/blue light on the objects' underside, right in the center.
it was viewable for about 10-15 seconds as it crossed the sky in a straight line before i lost sight of it at the tree-line horizon, i estimate it was traveling in a nw to se direction.
content.summary: Black triangle sailed overhead, no sound heard,

content.detailedDescription:
Ki meda 
eles passaram jogandu pedras e depois deram uns razantis eu tentei acertar eles com uma bola de tennis mas naum consegui eles eram ligeirus dimais oh...Safadus tavam atirandu pedras da janela
content.summary: Eles estavam jogando pedrinhas da janela.

content.detailedDescription: I was traveling to caraz localized in ancash, . it was around midnight, i was in the bus, when suddenly i saw near the mountains an object that change of colors to yellow, red, and blue for about ten minutes making strange movements. finally it dissapeared behind a mountain.
content.summary: A ufo that chage of colors to yellow, red and blue in ancash

content.detailedDescription:
Me and my wife have viewed many strange objects in the sky over the last 6 months we have reported most of them here! last night we were on the deck looking into the western sky and seen what looked like a plane taking off and going upward into the sky. as it got closer we seen that the light on the front of the craft was angled upward and it just looked as if it was going upward into the sky when it was flying the same  level.

 it flew south about 3 miles and made a complete left turn and flew right over our house. it was so big it was blocking out some of the sky and stars as it went by! about the length of 300 yards. it was about 2000 feet above us and "no sound" nothing we could not believe it. we live in the landing path of the air port and some of the smaller planes shake our house during landing. this craft had no sound and we find this very strange.

my video camera went dead so i could not get it shot but will be investing in a new camera to much activity going on around us not to.

i did a search on youtube and found exactly what we seen to the t. i think this was recorded in japan.

http://www.Youtube.Com/watch?V=kofrgth-_sw
content.summary: Huge triangle with many lights  300 yards long

content.detailedDescription:
It was almost noon time on a gorgeous, 70 degree, cloudless, windless, autumn afternoon. i was lying on my hammock in the backyard, which is a few acres surrounded by tall bushes and a few trees, gazing in appreciation of the crystal blue clearness of the sky, scanning it as i always do for that hopeful glimpse of something other-worldly as i quite often do. i'm an average 39 year old, with a normal life, a husband and son, living in a normal town, but i have always had an open mind. it's important to note that i have been researching and studying the ufo phenomenon for 20 years or more. although i have never seen anything i could absolutely, without a doubt, swear was an outright ufo, i have had many "could be's". especially this day in particular...
as i lay in the hammock, my back to the sun, and facing north, i thought i would just "ask" the powers that be to "please show me something that i will know right away is not of this world. i'll count down from 10 to 1 and when i open my eyes it will be right there in the distance in front of me when i open them." sounds wacky, i know. but i'm sure anyone who believes in ufo's would love a confirmation of it!! well, i asked this 3 times to open my eyes to nothing but the beautiful clear sky, with the exception of a plane or two. (all of which had thin trails behind them.) at this point, i sort of gave up, saying "some people have the ability to summons them on command, and i'm just not one of those people...Sigh." just as i finished that thought, my 8 year old son came into the backyard, and proceeded to lay down next to me on the hammock. i said to him "maybe you can help me..." (he's as open minded as i am, my husband not-so-much!)i asked him to join me in asking to see something out of this world. he agreed. i started the count down. we got to three and he said "i didn't concentrate. let's do it again." so he very matter of fact said in a whisper "dear god, (a phrase i hadn't personally used in addressing the who-evers or what-evers that would make this happen, and we aren't big church go-ers) please show us a ufo (a word i hadn't used yet in asking either) 5-4-3-2-1..." it was so endearing, the way he went about it. and lo' and behold, when i opened my eyes, directly in front of them, but many miles away above the tall tree line, there it was. a something!! just sitting there. i jumped off the hammock in an instant, and shouted to my son while pointing "do you see it??" he was silent for a moment, then said, "nooo..." it took me awhile to orient him to the tree line and the exact location (i don't know if you know how difficult that is to do with a child!) within 20 or 30 seconds, he saw it. i was shrieking and freaking out, and here is what it appeared to be: a star-like shine, completely stationary, as big as venus in the night sky and a bit brighter, no trails, no smoke. as i stared in amazement, delight, and wonder, i never had any negative feeling. only complete and utter appreciation. we asked. we received- something! i told my son to run in and grab the binoculars. he was quick! i did not want to take my eyes off of it. upon looking through the binoculars, i could see this highly reflective egg or diamond shape. it was so reflective (or shining) that all the colors of the rainbow were visible on and around it. the 'object' was motionless for at least 5 minutes. that is, until we called for my husband to come and have a look. reluctantly, he came out and looked through the binoculars, and couldn't readily give any explanation to what he was seeing. (he's usually full of explanations!)but as he viewed the 'object' it ever-so-slowly started to float away from and east of us. soooo slowly, though. until we could no longer see it through the trees. we didn't take a picture, because i know it would appear as a light blob, or just make a mockery of the beauty of it! it was amazing! and even if it wasn't something from somewhere else, it happened before our eyes after asking to see something special. i was reluctant to write, because of the circumstances in which it appeared, and that we have no evidence. but the 3 of us all saw it. plain as day. for atleast 10 minutes. giddily, i went in to make lunch. and i have told this story unashamedly, to many non-believers since.
content.summary: Son, husband and i saw stationary star-like, almost egg-shaped, object in sky. very metallic and reflective through binoculars. lasted about 10 minutes until it slowly  floated out of view.

rifet bahtijaragic

content.summary: Taking pictures at river and spheres and colors started showing up in alignments, as if a crop circle kind of thing in the air. i thought they pretty until i got home and found out one of the pictures was an alien head as the top sphere!

content.detailedDescription: While burning trash in my backyard i looked up and noticed a black object in the sky and i could also hear a jet but couldnt see it.I went into the house to get my binoculars  and came back the object was gone.About five minutes later i saw the same black object heading east and  a f15 chasing it . this craft had a bat wing shape and much faster than the jet.I only heard one jet sound.I live near a base that has a fighter group stationed there but i have never seen a craft like the black one i saw.I watched until both craft went into a cloud bank.
content.summary: Bat like shape

content.detailedDescription: Seen it outside house in the north-west sky.It was gone later.
content.summary: Sighted outside house.

content.detailedDescription: On october 1, 2008 at 10:09am i recorded an object in the sky with an infrared camera. i set up this infrared camera after witnessing a v shaped object at night with my night vision scope. the object in this video resembles objects i have seen in some nasa footage where infrared cameras were used.
content.summary: Object recorded with infrared camera

content.detailedDescription:
I have experienced close ufo encounters. the field investigator that was here during the evening of the following report of this electrical event, was also here at my home in 2006, when we both experienced a close encounter of a lare triangular craft. 
(see cms reports...Michigan "date of event" 8-25-06)



saturday, september 20, 2008...

my husband left friday (9-19-08), early am for the upper peninsula of michigan for 10 days to go fishing. my neighbors directly to the south of me, had gone out-of-town for the weekend as their son was getting married. my neighbor directly to the north of me was home, (his wife was out of state visiting relatives).

both my daughters & i had spent most of the day saturday house-cleaning: mopping, vacuuming, doing laundry, etc. my daughters each invited a friend to spend the night that night as well and so at approx 5-5:10pm, we left our house to go pick up their friends and make a couple other stops. we arrived back home at approx 7:45pm, and at 8pm, i took my dogs out front (west) and hooked them to their tie-outs. it was warm & decent out...(dark, half moon, millions of stars, somewhat humid)...So i stood outside, when i got a funny uneasy feeling. after about 8-10 minutes, i unhooked the dogs from their tie-outs & brought them back in. 

while back inside now, approx 5 minutes later, i walked down the hallway into my bedroom putting stuff away, and proceeded to close all of my bedroom window blinds. i hit the light-switch off, & as i went to leave the bedroom, i thought i had forgotten something, so i quickly glanced back around the room. upon starting to turn back around to head out of my bedroom, there was this huge white flash, right by the north bedroom window, but outdoors (my blinds were shut)...Yet this white flash didn't show in my west window. i instantly think lightning?, yet i know it's nice out, as i had just come in...Then i think "camera flash". the girls and their friends are always taking photos. 

i stepped directly across the hallway into my daughter's bedroom, and i notice her blinds are still open & ask her if they had just taken a picture, when she says..."no, my camera is over there", pointing, then she says "mom, i just saw a fla--" , and right in the middle of her saying that, a white flash of white light happened again...And this was just outside her north window and yet nothing from her east window (backyard). 

these flashes came from the north end of our home, where there are no electrical poles/wires/etc...Nothing outside at all. all electrical wires/boxes/etc, are located at the south end of my home, and power lines along the road (west). we have a 1-story ranch, with a walk-out basement in the north end of our home, which puts the north end of our home up like a 2-story.

this is where it gets weird...

almost instantly after the second flash, everything in the house that is electrical/electronic and has juice running to it, starts flashing, crackling, buzzing and humming. all you could hear was electricity running rampant through-out the entire house, as though someone took 10 live power lines from the street and laid them through-out our home...On walls, ceilings, floors, etc...Inside and out. it was this very loud static, crackling, humming, buzzing....And very unnerving.

i instantly get my daughters and their friends to grab their sleep over stuff, the dogs,and get out of the house. i tell the kids to stay away from the house and sit out in the driveway.

i step back in, as what i had instantly noticed that was very odd, all the gfi plug outlets were tripping, yet all the power to everything else in the entire house was still on, just going absolutely berserk...And it wasn't lessening. even lights that weren't turned on were coming on, etc...They had juice going to it (plugged in). i also thought it very odd that everything wasn't blowing/shorting out. there were absolutely no visible sparks/flames/smoke/fire anywhere...Nor the smell of any. 

it is now approx 8:30-8:35pm, i call my friend <name deleted> (also a mufon fi) who lives approx 4 miles n/w of me, i explain what's going on & i ask her to come over fast.

i hang up and call 911, and alert them to what's going on, then i call consumers energy, but consumers energy doesn't answer their emergency line to which i tried a few more times (which in itself is very strange). i then call 911 back and 911 dispatch says they have a special tele#, and they will call consumers energy. 911 dispatch then calls me back, saying consumers energy will be here in awhile, they give me an order #, and tell me to call them back (911), if anything else happens in the meantime. 

in the meantime, i am thinking major electrical meltdown in my home...Shorting everything out. i go back outdoors, to see if anything is burning and to check the outdoor poles/power lines and transformers. as i look around, going over everything, that's when i observe that its only my house. none of the neighbors yard lights/porch lights/pole barn lights/nothing...Is doing anything abnormal...It is strictly only my home. i attempt to call my neighbor to the south of me, just in case someone is there (no-one home). i then call my neighbor to the north of me, but no answer. they usually go to bed around 8pm, as he gets up for work about 4am....So i leave a message on their answering machine. 

my friend <name deleted> gets here approx 9pm. with all the kids/pets safe outdoors, her & i head back into the house, and proceed to the basement, to check the main/breaker box. the entire basement is doing the same thing as the upstairs, and as we turn the corner to enter the office room, the sound is even worse. the entire wall around and behind the main breaker box is loudly snapping, crackling, buzzing, etc. i hesitated opening the main breaker box door, as i didn't want it to flash, if it contained any fire/sparking/etc, thats when <name deleted> reaches over and opens it.......There's nothing visible to indicate anything wrong...Its just normal looking. none of the breakers had tripped.

finally, approx 10pm, the electrical starts slowing down its bizarre behavior, and isn't so intense now, so i come back in and do a walk-thru', checking everything out. i tell everyone to go ahead and come back in but sit right in the living room for a quick exit. no-one from consumers energy has shown up yet.  about 10:20pm, <name deleted> and i step back outdoors looking around checking the outside power poles & neighbors again...Approx 5 minutes later...All the electrical totally 100% stops acting up...5 minutes after that, consumers energy shows up...It is now 10:30pm.

the guy is here for a good 1 & 1/2 hrs, until approx 12 midnight, checking everything he possibly can, inside and out with a fine toothed comb. he checks all the poles/lines on my property. he even puts monitoring equipment on my main electrical breaker box. he is shocked that nothing shows anything ever happened. he had me reset all the gfi's, and turn on everything major, such as the oven, garbage disposal, microwave, etc...Everything worked just fine. 

he checked in & out over & over...He can't find anything wrong anywhere. he is very puzzled by all this. he's been doing this for 24 years and there was nothing to show anything had ever happened....No scorch, burn marks, no wires burnt, nothing short-circuited...And everything tested that everything was normal. none of the breakers were ever tripped..He said that nothing should still be working...It should all be fried. he found the whole thing very odd, and he kept bringing up the flashes of white light i told him we had witnessed immediately before it all started. 

he finally leaves and he drives back & forth down my road, and back by my house, to see if any line/transformer is messed up...Nothing. <name deleted> leaves and sends me a text message upon arriving at her home to say she made it home ok...It is now 1:22am. 

at 2:04 am...All the nightlight's, and emergency lights in my entire house start flickering and flashing again, however, there is no noise at all this time...No electrical buzzing-humming, no crackling, no sparking sound. i went thru' a couple of rooms & tested by turning on lights and they too were doing the erratic flashing/flickering, but no sound. i checked on all the girls, and to make sure nothing is burning/etc, anywhere. the last time i looked at the clock it was 3am....I awoke at 6am.


sunday september 21, 2008...

later in the day, i call my neighbor to the north of me, and just as i thought, he said that he was already asleep when i had called saturday evening....And though he always hears the phone ring when he's asleep, he just lets the answering machine get it. he did get my message and indicated that he checked around his home, including all clocks (for flashing if power was interrupted), and he experienced absolutely no electrical interference, that he was aware of. 

when i went to leave to take my daughter's friend home, i noticed the electrical event also affected my tahoe's instrument panel. i leased my truck august 2007---brand new---its a 2007 chevy tahoe. i have an appt to take it in to the dealership this coming week...Thankfully its under warranty.

notes:

consumers energy (power company) could not find anything wrong, nor any evidence of anything ever even happening, so in the days that followed, i had an electrician, as well as a heating/cooling/plumbing technician come out. not a one of them could find any burnt, scorched, fried shorted wires nor anything else to show that anything happened....Except...They did confirm, that whatever happened, did destroy my a/c. i have an appt to have my truck checked out as well.
content.summary: Bizarre electrical event.....Mufon asd & fi

content.detailedDescription:
Hi,
  last night on oct 1, 2008 i saw 2 star sized objects that went extremely fast in the night sky in so.Calif.(cabazon) at about 8:00p.M. chase each other in the sky. this is the third time ive witnessed this sort of phenomenom. the first time i saw this happen the objects were doing insane manuevers  such as stopping on a dime and turns that were much sharper than 90 degrees. what are these things?? military maybe? super sattelites?? please help me to understand  sincerley   chris
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Star like objects doing insane manuevers

content.detailedDescription:
Wednesday, october 1st 2008, approximately 7:15-7:20 p.M. my wife and i were standing on our deck enjoying the crisp fall air when, almost simultaneously, we both notice a large metallic cigar-shaped craft in the northern sky.  quickly i realized it wasn't anything either of us had seen before, as it left no exhaust trail and was moving way too slow to be any conventional aircraft other than maybe a blimp which is highly unlikely for our area.  as we stood there almost mezmerized by this "craft" our kids had come to the door and were curious as to what we were looking at. when we turned to acknowledge them and try to point it out to them (which was a matter of seconds), it was nowhere to be seen. strangely enough there were at least 4-5 jets in the same area at the same time, which was actually what had brought our attention to that particular area in the first place.  after that, we went inside and discussed possibilities of what it could have been, ruling out every earthly possibility (noting that it either "disappeared" or took off at an ungodly speed).  
later that night after we put the kids to bed we decided to throw on our jackets and do some star gazing. throughout the evening from roughly 9 p.M. to 10:30 p.M. we also witnessed bright lights that were moving suspiciously slow with no flashing lights whatsoever, most of which were very distant. they had seemed to appear, move a short distance and eventually fade out. the last strange "light" we had witnessed was very unnerving as it seemed very low to the ground and alot closer than the rest. it had what appeared to be three stationary lights and again moved slowly from east to west never seeming to be moving farther away, and like the ones before it had just faded out.  considering the event earlier in the evening, my wife and i were excited yet perplexed at the mysterious lights we had seen.  myself, being an avid ufo buff, am convinced that what i witnessed was nothing that i've seen on this planet except in other ufo documentation. my wife, (being somewhat of a "skeptic") is not sure what she saw, but stressed to me that it was nothing she's ever experienced before.
content.summary: Saw large metallic cigar shaped craft moving slowly in northern sky, looked away for couple of seconds and it disappeared.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving my semi east on interstate 40 about 50 0r so miles from tucumcari nm. i saw a light moving along the ridge to my left. i watched it for about 15 seconds. then it came towards me and crossed the road in front of me about 50 ft off the ground and out into the desert and dissapeard over the ridge on my right. the disatance it traveled was approx. 20 miles. it crossed that distance in less than a fraction of a second. my rough calculation is about 60,000 miles an hour. as it passed me, my truck and all electronics went dead. a few observations  i made are as follows. even though the object was so bright no details were visible. it didnt light up the surrounding desert like it should have. there was no bowshock or wind disturbance of any kind from its passing. the paper and debris on the road was undisturbed.It appeared as a huge dome of light about 300 feet across and maybe 100 ft high.There was also nosound and after it passed my electronics came back on.
content.summary: About size and sape of superdome
